title: Mother charged with murder for ‘shooting boy who raped her six year-old daughter’
text:
Connie Serbu is due to stand trial Thursday for the murder of 18 year-old Xavier Sierra, who she reportedly shot dead after discovering he’d raped her six year-old daughter (Pictures: Collier County Sheriff’s Office)

A vengeful mother is due to stand trial today charged with murdering a man said to have raped her daughter when the youngster was just six.

Connie Serbu, 43, has been charged with the second-degree murder of Xavier Sierra, 18, after allegedly luring him into an isolated wooded area during July 2016.

Her trial is scheduled to start in Naples, Florida, at 9am Thursday morning.

Serbu reportedly told Sierra she needed help building a bunk bed, and is then said to have blasted Sierra to death.

She picked him up from a job interview at an animal clinic, then quizzed him about the alleged rape while driving, is it alleged.

Serbu’s brother John Vargas, pictured, was shot during a scuffle with Serra, and also died

On arriving at the kill site, Serbu and her brother John Vargas, 29, reportedly chased Sierra down when he tried to run away.

Sierra and Vargas wrestled with the gun, with Sierra shot six times and Vargas receiving one bullet to the abdomen.

Both men ended up dying of those injuries shortly afterwards.

Serbu was still at the scene when police arrived, according to the Naples Daily News, and is said to have made an unrepentant confession.

She reportedly told cops: ‘It’s all my fault.

‘So I don’t care, he raped my daughter … she told me everything that happened.’

Serbu is said to have plotted the murder for months.

She is said to have told her husband that ‘she was going to do something’ in May 2016 after discovering the alleged sex attack, said to have taken place in 2011.

Serbu is also said to have warned her spouse that he would end up raising their children alone.

The mother reportedly told friends what she was plotting, prompting them to beg her to go to the police instead.
description: Connie Serbu is due to stand trial in Naples, Florida, on Thursday charged with the July 2016 murder of Xavier Sierra
